title: Cylinder Slice
description: A slice of an implicit cylinder. Defines the subsection of the cylinder that the implicit volume actually occupies.

minRadius.description: The start of the slice along the radius of the cylinder.

maxRadius.description: The end of the slice along the radius of the cylinder.

minHeight.description: The start of the slice along the height of the cylinder.

maxHeight.description: The end of the slice along the height of the cylinder.

minAngle.description: The start of the slice along the angle of the cylinder. Values must be in the range [-pi, pi].

maxAngle.description: The end of the slice along the angle of the cylinder. Values must be in the range [-pi, pi].
